name: The Magnificent Magnet Maniac
description:
This game is utter horse poo. :)

Enjoy a wonderfully dull world of floating enemies, overly large maps and excessive explosions (not sponsored by Michael Bay). 

This game was made with crushed ambitions and the Unity Game engine.

Controls: 

  • W: forward
  • A: Left
  • S: Back
  • D: Right
  • E: Interact
  • Left Mouse: catch enemies relentless amount of bullets.
  • Space: jump/latch onto walls/ run on walls(Cool ik)

The sleep deprived devs:

  • Derich Havenga, thinks large levels are cool
  • Jan-Hendrik Brink, Can't code and sleep at the same time
  • Chandre Willemse, Emotional support modeler.
  • Theresa Labuscagne, Modeler of the year.
